tabs: Required to send messages via the chrome.tabs api to the page content script, and vice versa
Required by chrome.tabs.query for resolving the current URL of the active tab. This is required for running checks on specific pages (To see if the active page is 'employee.entelect.co.za')
storage: Needed to save the local storage of users whose notifications won't be cleared when selecting 'Clear all notifications'
contextMenus: Used to add a context menu entry to every page, where you can highlight some text and add it to the exclusions list.

content_scripts.reason: The content script is meant to run on every page, as it is used to send push notifications in the form of notifications and reminders to the employee.
